summary: This document contains financial transaction details including incoming and outgoing wires, checks, and account information related to Epstein and associated entities. It highlights transactions involving significant amounts of money and various beneficiaries, indicating financial activities linked to Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is mentioned as a beneficiary in a financial transaction involving the Virgin Islands Foundation.

connections.description: Epstein is associated with the Virgin Islands Foundation as a beneficiary in a financial transaction.

keyFacts: The document details financial transactions dated April 20, 2017.
Jeffrey Epstein is listed as a beneficiary of a transaction involving the Virgin Islands Foundation.
Significant amounts of money are mentioned, including a transaction of $100,000.
The document includes references to multiple financial institutions, including Silicon Valley Bank and FirstBank Puerto Rico.
The document is marked as confidential under federal rules.
